mapper.insert: insert into `operation` (id, `name`, type, `from`, element, data, code, description, project_id, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{from}, #{element}, #{data}, #{code}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select * from `operation` where name = #{name} and (project_id = #{projectId} or project_id = 'system')
